cyclone.name: DANNY
cyclone.current_location: about 110 miles ESE of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the central South Carolina coast, then expected to continue inland across Georgia and Alabama
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of South Carolina near Charleston (between Edisto Beach and South Santee River)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Edisto Beach to South Santee River, South Carolina
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia coast and the South Carolina coast from Savannah River to South Santee River
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm-force winds of 35–45 mph with higher gusts possible late Monday afternoon and evening
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1–3 ft above ground level possible around high tide in Charleston Harbor
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain with locally higher amounts; brief urban flooding possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and dangerous marine conditions for harbor and approach channels
